entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy near midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill minus 22 this evening. Forecast issued 9:13 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of light snow near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:13 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023
